name: cancer ribbon hat
notes:
elevate your crochet game and spread awareness with this free cancer ribbon hat pattern! 

crochet a cozy, stylish beanie featuring iconic awareness ribbons using front post double crochet color work for a textured, eye-catching design. 

perfect for breast cancer support in classic pink, or customize with yarn colors like grey for brain cancer awareness, orange for leukemia and kidney cancer, or gold for childhood cancers to honor any cause close to your heart.

available in three sizes—toddler, child, and adult—this versatile pattern includes detailed row-by-row written instructions and full-color graphs to guide you every step of the way. ideal as a chemo cap, thoughtful gift, or charity donation.

whether you're an intermediate crocheter looking to make a difference or hooking up hope for loved ones, this pattern combines comfort, creativity, and compassion.
